resources.string: I have studied law at Harvard
I\'ve studied criminology at Arkanas State University
I finished high school and went to two years long road trip with friends
What do you want to do now

You will soon begin to work in the homicide department at one of the New York\'s police stations. Your mentor and teacher is notorious Detective Jones. His knowledge and experience will surely help you to take the first steps in this demanding profession, but do not let him down! He is definitely the person you should have on your side.

Your first case will be to solve the mystery of the death of a New York University student. Katy was very popular girl, she had good grades, and never got into trouble. And yet, yesterday she was found dead in a fountain in a university park... \nDo not disappoint Detective Jones and show what you are worth - solve this case as soon as possible!
Please click BACK again to exit
This is a dialog box. Everthing the person says is here.
Fingerprint found on the statue head.
This is a statue with head detached.
Tap the door to open it
Ugh, did no one teach you to knock? What do you want?
Good morning Detective Jones!Well, my name is %1$s and I am your new partner at work. They say you are the best so I hope to learn a lot from you.
Of course I am the best! I just wonder why in return I need to work with kids from kindergarten! Did you at least study something?
Well actually I just finished %1$s, so I believe I can be a valuable addition to you resources.
You didn\'t find any proofs yet.

Yeah, well we\'ll see about it. For now make yourself useful and search the murder scene. There may be some useful proofs waiting for us to be find. Oh, and don\'t forget to read the case files carefully!
Choose the scene you want to search
This is where Katy has been found dead
This is the room in a dormitory, where Katy and her roommate lived
This is the laboratory at the New York University, where Katy has been spending a lot of time on her reasearch.
